name: Burial Ground
description: Small cemetery marked by wooden crosses and stone cairns. Some markers have names, most don't. Wildflowers grow here despite desert conditions. Quiet and still.
lighting_quality: Soft and diffused. Even harsh sun seems gentler here. Flowers add color.

acoustic_quality: Deeply quiet. Sounds seem to stop at the boundary. Wind doesn't disturb.

architectural_features: Flat stones (some carved with names or symbols)
atmosphere: Peaceful and solemn. A space holding grief and memory.
